=Tivo.Hme.ResolutionInfo=
 Resolution and aspect ratio 
==Properties==
|| *Property Name* || *Description* ||
|| Horizontal ||  Horizontal resolution  ||
|| PixelAspectHeight ||  pixel aspect ratio - height  ||
|| PixelAspectWidth ||  pixel aspect ratio - width  ||
|| Vertical ||  Vertical resolution  ||

==Methods==
|| *Method Name* || *Description* ||
|| Equals || overloaded ||
|| GetHashCode ||  returns the hash code such that two equal resources have the same hash code value.  ||
|| GetType || Inherited from System.Object. ||
|| ToString ||  Returns a readable version of the resolution data.  ||
